AssistantSid.description: The SID of the [Assistant](https://www.twilio.com/docs/autopilot/api/assistant) that is the parent of the FieldType associated with the resources to delete.

FieldTypeSid.description: The SID of the Field Type associated with the Field Value to delete.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the FieldValue resource to delete.
